title: Celine Dion albums discography
summary: Canadian singer Celine Dion has released 27 studio albums, seven live albums, 19 compilation albums, and 25 box sets. Dion is globally recognized as one of the biggest selling music artists in history. According to Nielsen Soundscan, she has sold 53.2 million albums in the United States, making her the second best-selling female artists in the country since Nielsen began tracking sales in 1991.[1] In 2003, Dion was honored by International Federation of the Phonographic Industry for selling 50 million albums in Europe.[2] Guinness World Records recognises her as the Top Selling Album Act in Europe with 33 million certified album sales since 1996 .[3] Billboard ranked her as the second best-selling female album artist of the 2000s Decade in the United States with 17.3 million sold via Soundscan.[4] She is the 6th all time best-performing female soloist in Billboard 200 history.[5] Dion is also the best-selling Canadian artist of all time and the best-selling artist in the Nielsen SoundScan era in Canada (from 1996).[6][7][8]
